function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective treatment for COVID-19","Impact":"High mortality rate and health impact","Mitigation":"Investment in research for effective treatments and vaccines","Technologies":"Biotechnology for vaccine development and drug discovery","People":"Global population","Owner":"Governments and pharmaceutical companies"},{"Description":"Inefficient traditional containment measures","Impact":"Inadequate control and response to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Adopting modern and effective non-pharmaceutical interventions","Technologies":"Advanced surveillance systems and data analytics for early detection","People":"Health organizations, governments","Owner":"Health organizations, governments"},{"Description":"Global recession due to pandemic","Impact":"Economic downturn and social disruption","Mitigation":"Implementation of targeted economic relief measures and support for affected industries","Technologies":"Economic forecasting and financial stimulus packages","People":"Global workforce, businesses","Owner":"Governments and financial institutions"}]}
